channel.description: Recent content in software on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: First GSOC blog post!
item.description: Welcome to my first GSOC blog post! Google Summer of Code (GSOC) 2020 has been going for a couple weeks now and I thought it would be fun to share what progress has been made so far. If you’re just joining now you should know that the first month or so is the ‘Community Bonding Period’. During this time the student developers get to know their community, establish expectations, and set recurring check-in meetings.

item.title: PhD Year 1 Semester 1 Recap
item.description: What a wild ride this semester has been! It’s 2:03AM on 1/3/2020. Considering what has happened in the past two hours, everything I’ve done seems a bit trivial. But we press on. I’m most proud of arcospy, a python translation of an existing R package. More info here. The TLDR is that I built a python API that allows users to query the Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) ARCOS opioid dataset for 2006-2012.
